resources.string: This is not an Arrhythmia. It is an artifact from electrical interference (60 cycles).
The highlighted section of the below ECG is a P-Wave.
The highlighted section of the below ECG is a Q-Wave.
The highlighted section of the below ECG is a R-Wave.
The highlighted section of the below ECG is a S-Wave.
The highlighted section of the below ECG is a T-Wave.
